name: Defile Armor
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Mythic Adventures © 2013, Paizo Publishing, LLC
text: As sanctify armor, except you gain DR 5/good when using your judgment or smite ability.
mythicText:
You gain DR 5/good while wearing the target armor. While using your judgment or smite ability, this improves to DR 10/good.

Augmented (3rd): If you expend two uses of mythic power, while you use your judgment or smite, add half your tier to your AC as a profane bonus.
savingThrow_zh: 意志，通过则无效 (无害，物体)
text_zh: 如同神圣护甲 (Sanctify Armor)，不过当你使用审判或制裁能力 (judgment or smite ability) 时获得DR 5/善良。
